name: bundle-all-spike
description: A spike to see if we can require a group of dependencies from the browser.

scripts.build:
npm run build:webpack && npm run build:browserify && npm run build:rollup && echo "
File Sizes:" && ls dist -lh
scripts.build:browserify: time -f "Process Time: %U" browserify browserify/index.js -o dist/browserify.js -s npm
scripts.build:webpack: time -f "Process Time: %U" webpack webpack/index.js dist/webpack.js --output-library npm --output-library-target umd

author: Dominic Chambers
